text: Depression opens the door to beauty of some kind.
author: James Hillman

text: Somehow a bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever.
author: Helen Rowland

text: Beauty is not something you can count on. Usually, when people say you are beautiful, it is when there is a harmony between the inside and the outside.
author: Emmanuelle Beart

text: Pay attention to the beauty surrounding you.
author: Anne Lamott

text: I'm not ugly, but my beauty is a total creation.
author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
